id.description: The pull request's unique ID. Note that pull request IDs are only unique within their associated repository.

state.description: The pull request's current status. The possible values are: 'OPEN', 'DECLINED', 'MERGED', 'SUPERSEDED'.

author.description: The author of the pull request.

source.description: The source branch and repository of the pull request.

draft.description: Whether the pull request is a draft or not.

merge_commit.description: The merge commit hash if the pull request has been merged.

close_source_branch.description: Whether the source branch should be deleted upon merge.
